Company Bill Statements

Centralize the purchase card process and get more visibility in your company’s spending.

Contact us
As good for your employees as it is for business

Every company wants to make employees happy while also reducing low-value tasks. With Company Bill Statements, you can offer administrators and end users a single spend management platform that’s easy to navigate, simplifies the review and reconciliation process, and alleviates the burden manual, time-consuming tasks.

Ensure employees are using the right vendors
Provide an intuitive UI and reduce costly mistakes
Maximize efficiency and let employees focus on more strategic tasks 

Read the brochure

How to get the most from your corporate card and p-card programs

As businesses everywhere reassess financial management, many are finding that integrated corporate card and p-card programs offer an easy way to save big and get more visibility into spending. Read the whitepaper and find out how your business can create a successful card program by:

Aligning your program to your purpose
Customizing your program to user needs
Driving adoption by keeping things simple
Mitigating risk, inaccuracies, and noncompliance
Constantly reviewing, refining, and optimizing

Read the whitepaper

Here’s what you can do with Company Bill Statements
Integrate with Concur Travel and Concur Expense

Get a comprehensive view and robust data across purchase card, travel, and expense on one platform.

Connect card feeds and policies

Extend your existing policy to your purchase card.

Capture all purchase card transactions

Automatically capture each transaction and pre-populate Company Bill Statements based on your preferred reconciliation period.

Review and reconcile in one place

Consolidate detailed statements for authorized approvers and simplify the process for everyone.
